mapper.insert: insert into suho_donation_content (content_id, title, content, target_amount, start_date, end_date, location, created_at, filename) values (donation_content_seq.nextval, #{title}, #{content}, #{target_amount}, #{start_date}, #{end_date}, #{location}, sysdate, #{filename})
mapper.select: select filename from suho_donation_content where content_id=#{content_id}
select * from suho_donation_content order by created_at desc
